attributes.action: Open a Public enquiry into grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: There has been a massive cover up and there needs to be a full investigation to bring this to an end
attributes.background: Open an enquiry into the cover up of grooming gangs and hold any official to account

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
